Portfolio.name: Shadipedia
Portfolio.des: Shadipedia is a mobile application. In this application the user can select any type of wedding material that he/she is looking for. App will provide the price, timing, information and location of the Venue, Car Rental Agency, Car Decorators, Venue Decorators, Food Providers and Gold Shop. A brief study of comparison with the existing solutions is also provided.

Portfolio.name: Try Kar Lo
Portfolio.des: Trykarlo android app which is single vendor app in which you can select item add to cart and order in which you can see pending orders and delivered orders then you can also try Product using try now button in which you can try virtually any item before order

Portfolio.name: FunBook
Portfolio.des: Website in React.js Like Facebook Login, Register, Profile, Posts, like and crud operation with backend.

Portfolio.name: Auctionare
Portfolio.des: Auctionare is platform which connects sellers and bidders. We want to solve the problem that bidders can be at one auction room at once. As auction take place in many areas but one bidder can be at one place so this platform provides bidder to bid on anything which is on auction list having a wide variety to bid on. As a seller, seller gets more bidders to bid on their items. Anyone can bid on items using this Mobile android app.
